A

activeMap - Static variable in class Driver.Main
object of map is created which is activeMap.
addContinent(String, int) - Method in class Map.Map
This method is used to add a continent to the Map.
addContinentView() - Method in class Views.MainView
This method is used to add new Continents to the Map
addNeighbours(String) - Method in class Map.Map.Territory
This method is used to add neigbours of a territory.
addTerritoryView() - Method in class Views.MainView
This method is used to add new Territory to the Map
allTerritoriesOwnBySinglePlayer(boolean) - Method in class Map.Map
The method will display all territories owned by a single player in the game.
armiesLeft - Variable in class Player.Player
Number of armies left for a player in integer value.
assignContinent(String) - Method in class Map.Map.Territory
This method is used to assign continent to a territory.
assignedTerritories - Variable in class Player.Player
list of territories.
assignedTerritoryNamesWithArmies() - Method in class Player.Player
This is a helper method which gives the number of countries a player has with the number of armies in that country.
assignInitialArmies() - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method defines Assigning the initial number of armies to each player who gets in the game.
assignInitialTerritories() - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method Assigns the initial territories randomly to the players in the game.
assignTerritoriesAndArmies() - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method is a part of startup phase and assign initial territories to players and gives them a set of initial armies and lets them place those armies in the assigned countries
attack() - Method in class Player.Player
The method will implement the attack phase.
attackPhaseView(Player) - Method in class Views.PhaseView
This method will display the player's name and also allow player to move his armies to attack in player's class.
